On Tue, 1 Mar 2005, bjoern_peters wrote:
> Thanks a lot for the help and especially Lucas for the sample
> scripts. I did not know that environment variables PATH_INFO and
> REQUEST_URI existed, which contain exactly what I need to solve my
> problems.
>
> After googling this, is it correct to assume that there will be
> problems when trying this on an IIS server? This would not affect me
> currently, but I wanted this to be usable as a general case wrapper
> around predition methods hosted on any platform.

mod_rewrite does not exist on IIS, so you'll need a different entry point. 
The PHP $REQUEST_URI var will also depend on server context.  If your goal 
is to create a mega-wrapper for all possible environments, that's a 
project in itself!

- Lucas
